title: Funerary inscription for Iulia Florentina
support:
A slab of Luna marble, partly corroded in the centre. Slighty convex in form
                                        (thinner at the edges). Intact on all sides. The rear is unfinished.

layout.p: Thirteen lines of Latin text, filling the available space.

date._: First quarter of the 4th century CE

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana
